QuestData.Title: Amulet of Rukhmar: The Final Key
QuestData.Description:
One last key is required to access the Apexis device. The writings pertaining to its location read:
"The final key has been housed deep within the fungal caves where the river makes its final drop. Though the pale orcs that dwell there may be vile, they should prove a worthy deterrent."
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and activate the final key to the Apexis device.

Objectives.Objective: Follow the clue to activate the final key
